BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.opengauss.ddl.OpenGaussAlterIndexStatement.setRenameIndex(IndexSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into OpenGaussAlterIndexStatement.renameIndex

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.opengauss.ddl.OpenGaussAlterViewStatement.setRenameView(SimpleTableSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into OpenGaussAlterViewStatement.renameView
